name: @mds-core/mds-metrics-sheet
description: Automate reporting api insert into LADOT compliance spreadsheet

scripts.test:unit: DOTENV_CONFIG_PATH=../../.env nyc --check-coverage --exclude tests --extension .ts --lines 50 --reporter=text --reporter=html ts-mocha --project ../../tsconfig.json --require tsconfig-paths/register --require source-map-support/register --require dotenv/config --recursive tests/**/*.ts

author: City of Los Angeles
